name: BulbriteSolana
0:
”Alexa, turn on the hallway light.”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Bulbrite Solana skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Bulbrite Solana devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Bulbrite Solana account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

- Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the Bulbrite Solana app and can be changed.
- Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups).

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

"Alexa, discover my devices."
"Alexa, turn on the hallway light."
"Alexa, set the porch light to 80%."
"Alexa, brighten Bedroom."
"Alexa, dim the living room to 20%."
"Alexa, brighten the kitchen by 30%."
"Alexa, make the living room green."
"Alexa, turn the desk lamp to cool white."
"Alexa, make the bedroom lights warmer."

If you have any questions, please visit the Bulbrite Solana FAQ at https://www.bulbritesolana.com/faq.
